nodes.text: The Star Fortress over Nar Shaddaa was one of many dozens, if not hundreds of Star Fortresses deployed by Emperor Arcann of the Eternal Empire to watch for possible uprisings on worlds subjugated during the Eternal Empire conquest. It was commanded by Exarch Lesin Tyn and protected by multiple Skytroopers and Knights of Zakuul. The Star Fortresses was randomly targeting people top be taken with no explanation, greatly restructing the freedom of the Smugglers' moon. In 3631 BBY the former Sith apprentice Veeroa Denz teamed up with the Commander of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance to take down the Star Fortress. Together they assembled a strike team that assaulted and destroyed the Nar Shaddaa shield bunker protecting the Star Fortress before regrouping on the Alliance base on Odessen. From there, Theron Shan and Miot Dengd assisted the Commander in infiltrating the Star Fortress. After fighting their way through multiple levels of the station, the Commander was able to reach the Sun Generator room and engage the Exarch directly. During the fierce fighting, safety features of the Sun Generator were disabled and Exarch Lesin Tyn was killed. The Commander barely managed to escape on the shuttle before the Sun Generator overloaded, vaporizing the entire Star Fortress and all of its remaining personnel. Following this event, the Hutt Cartel thanked the Commander for once again opening up Nar Shaddaa's great markets for business.
The Nar Shaddaa Star Fortress appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as one of six Star Fortresses that can be assaulted and destroyed.
